CodeList.Name: Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe the assessment or measurement of a tumor, lesion or site of disease.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The current value minus the lowest value previously recorded.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Absolute Change Nadir in Sum of Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Absolute Change Nadir in Sum of Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The current sum of diameters minus the lowest sum of diameters previously recorded.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Absolute Change From Nadir in Sum of Diameter

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary. (NCI)
A semiquantitative analysis of the average uptake of analyte by body tissue in relation to the total administered dose of the analyte.
The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference. (NCI)
An indication as to whether lesion failure occurred.
An indication as to whether an appropriate clinical context was present before lesion revascularization occurred.
An indication as to whether clinical or functional ischemia is present before lesion revascularization occurred.
An indication as to whether repeat revascularization of a lesion occurred.
An indication as to whether a performed procedure of a target lesion is considered successful.
An indication as to whether limb failure occurred.
The longest possible length of a straight line passing through the center of a circular or spheroid object that connects two points on the circumference.
The longest possible straight line or plane through a body or figure that is at a right angle to a given line or plane.
The verification/confirmation by other methods or modalities that a tumor, which has not been previously seen or characterized, is present in the subject.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Percent Change Baseline in Sum of Area
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Percent Change Baseline in Sum of Area
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current sum of areas minus the baseline sum of areas) divided by the baseline sum of areas, multiplied by 100.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Percent Change From Baseline in Sum of Area

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Percent Change Baseline in Sum of Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Percent Change Baseline in Sum of Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current sum of diameters minus the baseline sum of diameters) divided by the baseline sum of diameters, multiplied by 100.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Percent Change From Baseline in Sum of Diameter

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Percent Change Baseline in Sum of Volume
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Percent Change Baseline in Sum of Volume
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current sum of volumes minus the baseline sum of volumes) divided by the baseline sum of volumes, multiplied by 100.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Percent Change From Baseline in Sum of Volume

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Percent Change Baseline Sum Longest Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Percent Change Baseline Sum Longest Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current sum of longest diameters minus the baseline sum of longest diameters) divided by the baseline sum of longest diameters, multiplied by 100.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Percent Change From Baseline in Sum of Longest Diameter

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current value minus the baseline value) divided by the baseline value, multiplied by 100.
The (current value minus the lowest value previously recorded) divided by the lowest value previously recorded, multiplied by 100.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Percent Change Nadir in Sum Longest Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Percent Change Nadir in Sum Longest Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current sum of longest diameters minus the lowest sum of longest diameters previously recorded) divided by the lowest sum of longest diameters previously recorded, multiplied by 100.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Percent Change From Nadir in Sum of Longest Diameter

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Percent Change Nadir in Sum of Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Percent Change Nadir in Sum of Diam
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The (current sum of diameters minus the lowest sum of diameters previously recorded) divided by the lowest sum of diameters previously recorded, multiplied by 100.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Percent Change From Nadir in Sum of Diameter

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The transparency of a material to the passage of X-rays and other forms of radiation.
The plane through a body or figure that is at the shortest width of that body or figure.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Sum Diameters of Non Lymph Node Tumors
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Sum Diameters of Non Lymph Node Tumors
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A calculation of the aggregated diameter values for tumors other than the lymph nodes.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Sum of Diameters of Non Lymph Node Tumors

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Sum of Products of Perpendicular Diameters
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A calculation of the aggregated area values.
A calculation of the aggregated diameter values.
A calculation of the aggregated longest diameter values.
A calculation of the aggregated longest perpendicular values.
A calculation of the aggregated diameter values taken from the viable portion of the tumor mass.
A calculation of the aggregated volume values.
A condition or state of a tumor at a particular time.
An indication as to whether vessel failure occurred.
An indication as to whether an artery is patent (free of TLR or restenosis) following intervention.
An indication as to whether repeat revascularization of an artery containing a lesion occurred.
The diameter of the portion of the tumor mass that is capable of growth, proliferation and metastasis.
The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container. (NCI)

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Name Terminology
